Actions.description: The available actions for this resource.
Actions.longDescription: This type shall contain the available actions for this resource.

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

IOConnectivityLoSCapabilities.longDescription: Each instance of IOConnectivityLoSCapabilities describes capabilities of the system to support various IO Connectivity service options.

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

Actions.description: The available actions for this resource.
Actions.longDescription: The Actions property shall contain the available actions for this resource.

Identifier.longDescription: The value identifies this resource. The value shall be unique within the managed ecosystem.

MaxSupportedBytesPerSecond.description: The maximum Bandwidth in bytes per second that a connection can support.
MaxSupportedBytesPerSecond.longDescription: The value shall be the maximum bytes per second that a connection can support.

MaxSupportedIOPS.description: The maximum IOPS that a connection can support.
MaxSupportedIOPS.longDescription: The value shall be the maximum IOPS that a connection can support.

Oem.description: This is the manufacturer/provider specific extension moniker used to divide the Oem object into sections.
Oem.longDescription: The value of this string shall be of the format for the reserved word *Oem*.

SupportedAccessProtocols.longDescription: Access protocols supported by this service option. NOTE: SMB+NFS* requires that SMB and at least one of NFSv3 or NFXv4 are also selected, (i.e. {'SMB', 'NFSv4', 'SMB+NFS*'}).

SupportedLinesOfService.description: Collection of known and supported IOConnectivityLinesOfService.
SupportedLinesOfService.longDescription: The collection shall contain known and supported IOConnectivityLinesOfService.

OemActions.description: The available OEM specific actions for this resource.
OemActions.longDescription: This type shall contain any additional OEM actions for this resource.

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.
